thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1933
thread.title: Mary J.

author: Mary J.
title: Mary J.
text:
I searched for cheap flights from US to New Zealand and I stumbled on FlightHub t and they offer good flights scheduled and also lowest of all.
I booked my daughter's ticket without any hassle and the confirmation was sent back very fast too.
They don't have information on baggage/luggage policy for every airlines but they have a handy tool they use for you to check those information with your selected flight carrier.
Very satisfied. I will use your service again and will recommend your service to family and friends.
Thank you.
